means: （尤指爱情）得不到回应或报答的

sentence.Network_en: Wickedness does not go altogether unrequited.
She fell in an unrequited love with the artist.
At any rate, my love for Rachel remained unrequited.
sentence.Network_cn: 总之, 我对雷切尔的爱一直是单恋.

entry.def: If you have unrequited love for someone, they do not love you.

example.ex: ...his unrequited love for a married woman.
example.tran: 他对一个已婚女子的暗恋

auth_sentence.content: On Bad Religion, he bemoans unrequited love.
auth_sentence.res_content: On Bad Religion, he bemoans unrequited love.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On Bad Religion, he bemoans unrequited love.

auth_sentence.content: But she repudiated his offer of companionship in her unrequited love.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But she repudiated his offer of companionship in her unrequited love.

auth_sentence.content: Unrequited love is painful, but sometimes the pain is quite beautiful.
